name: Relic Bound
description:
You, an explorer, have located a rare and powerful living enzyme, “Ez-Ch3” on a melting icy-alien planet. Ez-Cs3 can be salvaged and turned into an energy source that has the potential to power Earth indefinitely. Throughout your journey, the indigenous inhabitants explain that the emergence of this enzyme is causing their world to melt.

Figure out how to collect the enzyme, and then choose to take it back with you to power Earth while risking the destruction of the alien world, or leave it behind to find an alternate power source, saving the planet.
